channel.title: Wanting to play minecraft
channel.description: Hey guys, so im fresh to the PC Minecraft community and I don't have the game on PC. I've seen topics offering cracks, but they're all outdated or the files have been removed from the website. I was wondering if anybody had a Safe version for download...? or nowadays would it be better to just buy the game..?

item.title: Wanting to play minecraft
item.dc:creator: @ReptarTheMage ReptarTheMage
item.description:
@ReptarTheMage wrote:

Hey guys, so im fresh to the PC Minecraft community and I don’t have the game on PC. I’ve seen topics offering cracks, but they’re all outdated or the files have been removed from the website. I was wondering if anybody had a Safe version for download…? or nowadays would it be better to just buy the game…?

Read full topic
